name: Lot of trouble
description:
In this arcade game, you have to drive from your parking lot to the exit. Cause as much as possible chaos for a awesome high score. But be careful, the grandmas and policemen reduce your score. But what happens, if you hit five policemen? Try it out and let the party begin!

Controls: WASD or arrow keys

This game was created while the second Hannover Game Jam.

Team
Hanna Borgstaedt
Eugen Janke (Twitter)
Ben der böse Zauberer
